title: DSE Policy Constraints (Mandatory Thresholds)
description: Mandatory governance parameters defining the minimum acceptable performance and stability metrics required for a successful P-01 PASS and state commitment. Used by the Auditor Core to validate DSE_Commitment_Summary_Manifest artifacts.

mandatory_metrics.description: Required minimum performance metrics for DSE commitment (P-01 floor values).

temm_minimum.description: Minimum required Target Evolution Momentum Metric (TEMM). Manifest TEMM must be >= this value.

ufrm_minimum.description: Minimum required Underlying Functional Resilience Metric (UFRM). Manifest UFRM must be >= this value.

cftm_epsilon_floor.description: Minimum acceptable Commitment Finality Threshold Margin (CFTM Epsilon). Manifest CFTM must be > this value to ensure a safety margin.

system_veto_logic_hash.description: Cryptographic hash of the immutable Veto Logic Set (VLS) against which the epoch was verified.
